bibl.title: A Trauma of Cervical Spine Described in the Edwin Smith Papyrus Found in a Ptolemaic Tomb at Saqqara.
bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society - Leiden Museum and University Mission at Saqqara, 1999. - In Chamber A of Tomb 99/1: find of an hoard of 246 Ptolemaic silver coins (IInd-Ist cent. B.C.) and find of 2 cervical vertebrae of an invalidated male, hemiplegic or quadruplegic.
STROUHAL Eugen and Ladislava HORÁCKOVÁ, A Trauma of Cervical Spine Described in the Edwin Smith Papyrus Found in a Ptolemaic Tomb at Saqqara.
EtTrav 21 (2007) pp. 129-137, 1 fac-sim., 6 figg., 2 reprod. de monnaies, 1 plan.
